attributes.action: Create a document similar to the US green new deal to aim for zero emissions
attributes.additional_details:
The Green New Deal is explained through this video- https://youtu.be/GxIDJWCbk6I
Which goes in to detail the importance of a Green New deal for our economy and workers. It would also set a plan of real immediate action to combat climate change before it is too late. It is getting to the point where this issue is no longer an issue just to talk about but instead we must take the initiative.
attributes.background: Leading politicians in the US have created a new Green Deal which not only accepts the scale of change needed to combat climate change but also that we must protect workers rights through out this transition. The UK government should create a similar document to provide clarity for the electorate.
